name: 2D Shooter (noahmathew14)
description:
MAKE SURE TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!!!

The following modifications:

1. Unlimited reappearing spawn systems on the final level

2. Multiplier for Score (player can see the multiplier change overtime as they defeat more enemies; the multiplier will increase the player's rate of scoring)

3. Aesthetics: New Audio inputs for background and as well as sound effects for winning screens. There are different images for winning and losing different music for different levels (ie. the more levels the faster the tempo choice of music).
